Several lawmakers and veterans groups , including the the American Legion , also have called for the ouster of Mr. Shinseki .
Mr. Shinseki faced hostile questioning on Capitol Hill last week about secret waiting lists allegedly used at some VA hospitals to conceal extended delays in treatment .
The delays and waiting lists have been blamed for 40 deaths at a VA hospital on Phoenix , CNN reported .
